entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning early this evening and ending before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 11. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 11 April 2023
